message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you and the overall market value, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer strikes a balance between reflecting its true value and ensuring a fair deal for both parties. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of this transaction and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies us both.
